definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
usually/in many cases/more often than not
usually/in many cases/more often than not
to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
to associate (with)/to have contact (with)/to hang out (with)/to date/(interpersonal) relationship/association/contact
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to go back and forth/to go to and fro/round trip
to yearn for/to look forward to
(of a bus, train etc) to leave for/heading for

sentences.english: He faned his face with a magzine.
Look, the moving van is backing into their driveway.
sentences.chinese: 你看，运家具的大卡车正在往他们家的车道上倒车呢。

sentences.english: A little down? Do you mean move it down to the left?
sentences.chinese: 有点往下？你的意思是说把它往左边移下一点。

sentences.english: European commissioner Chris Patten caught the mood when he suggested yesterday that Israel had dealt with a fire by pouring gasoline on the flames.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟外委会专员彭定康称，以色列这是往火上浇油。

sentences.english: Bend at the knee when you ski downhill.
sentences.chinese: 你从山上往下滑雪时，要屈着膝。

sentences.english: Every day, 30 lorries and containers will be made overseas Anping wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 每天有30辆货车及集装箱将安平丝网发往外地。

sentences.english: Then walk to the traffic light. Make another left to Wooster.
sentences.chinese: 然后再走到交通灯处，再往左转就到了。

sentences.english: Heat the oil in a large, heavy soup pot or Dutch oven over medium heat, and add the onion.
sentences.chinese: 往一个大汤壶或荷兰烤肉锅中浇上油，热锅后加洋葱。

sentences.english: I cupped the deers muzzle in my hand and breathed into its hot mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我用手环住鹿的吻部，往它温热的嘴里吹气。

sentences.english: Just adding it and filling up our containers with more and more stuff.
sentences.chinese: 往我们的容器里增加，装上越来越多的东西。

sentences.english: The music of the far-away summer flutters around the Autumn seeking its former nest.
sentences.chinese: 远远往了的夏之音乐，翱翔于秋间，寻求它的旧垒。

sentences.english: If a man owns a hundred sheep, and one of them wanders away, will he not leave the ninety-nine on the hills and go to look for the one that wandered off?
sentences.chinese: 他岂不撇下这九十九只，往山里去找那只迷路的羊么。

sentences.english: Come, I am going to send you to them.
sentences.chinese: 你来，我要打发你往他们那里去。

sentences.english: Gas with the piston movement from right to left and is gradually compressed.
sentences.chinese: 气体随着活塞从右往左运动而逐渐被紧缩。

sentences.english: B. The food tasted bad, however Aunt Kit fixed it.
sentences.chinese: 饭菜不好吃，可姬特姑妈还往里加调味料。

definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off
from now on/in the future/time to come
to turn back/to retrace one's steps
